title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Expert Course on Augmented Reality-Based Science Education Design and Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Diagnose the educational integration of AR educational content on a 5-point scale using the EVAR assessment rubric.
Implement three or more interactive elements using AR technology when designing science experiment simulations.
Plan and develop AR learning scenarios to achieve an average score of 3 or higher across 18 evaluation criteria through peer assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
